name: CreateCrmObjectAssociation
description:
Create an association between HubSpot CRM objects.

This tool creates an association between specified HubSpot CRM objects. Use it when you need to link different CRM objects (like contacts and companies) within the HubSpot platform.

parameters.name: crm_object_type_schema
parameters.description: Fully qualified name or object type ID of your CRM object schema to create the association.

value_schema.description: Fully qualified name or object type ID of your schema.

parameters.name: primary_object_type_id
parameters.description: ID of the primary object type to link from in the CRM system.

value_schema.description: ID of the primary object type to link from.

parameters.name: target_object_type_id
parameters.description: ID of the target object type to link to in the CRM association.

value_schema.description: ID of the target object type to link to.

parameters.name: association_name
parameters.description: A unique name for the association between CRM objects. This helps identify the link.

value_schema.description: A unique name for this association.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.description: Fully qualified name or object type ID of your schema.

value_schema.description: Fully qualified name or object type ID of your schema.

parameters.name: fromObjectTypeId
parameters.description: ID of the primary object type to link from.

value_schema.description: ID of the primary object type to link from.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A unique name for this association.

value_schema.description: A unique name for this association.

parameters.name: toObjectTypeId
